parameters.name: InsertionPoint
parameters.description: Insertion point , which is a 2D point with z = 0.0, for the block definition

title: ISketchManager.MakeSketchBlockFromSketch
description: Creates a block definition at the specified location using all of the sketch entities in the active sketch.
signature:
SketchBlockDefinition MakeSketchBlockFromSketch( 
   MathPoint
InsertionPoint
,
   Sketch
Sketch
)

parameters.description: Insertion point , which is a 2D point with z = 0.0, for the block definition
